title: Animal trading card

thumbnail.alt: A comic-book picture of Lockjaw, a huge dog with superpowers

description: My first project as a nanodegree-student. A card of someone's favorite animal styled with CSS. My animal is a special one!

title: Pixel art maker

thumbnail.alt: A smiling face drawn on a pixel-canvas

description: A drawing-canvas app, styled with a unique star wars theme. The user is able to create a grid where he can paint by picking different colors.

title: Classic arcade game clone

thumbnail.alt: A screenshot of the game in action

description: A game where the user controls a player and tries to reach the end of the canvas while avoiding some enemies. The game involves a unique football theme.

title: Memory game

thumbnail.alt: A view of a human's brain in action

description: A game that requires focus and good memory! The user flips some cards trying to match them in pairs

title: My reads app
description: My-Reads, is an app that helps someone keep track of the books he is currently reading, has read or wants to read. The book results are limited by a rest API server.

title: Lefkada's beach viewer

thumbnail.alt: A view from above of the "Porto-katsiki" beach

description: The final project of my scholarship in Udacity's front-end web developer nanodegree. An app that presents the Greek Ionian island of Lefkada and a photo gallery of it's beaches.

title: Feed reader testing
description: This project, was about creating unit tests with jasmine library. A feed reader website was provided by Udacity and I had to write some tests to ensure that everything works.

title: Restaurant reviews app

thumbnail.alt: Three gears, each with different color

description: This project, was about handling the responsiveness, accessibility and caching of a given app that contains reviews of New York city's restaurants.
